properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vinumu sodara vintavaartanu devadevude tyagamayenu A devude dayato nannu vedaki vachega{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Calvari prabhun ganchu sodaraa vreladenu Yesu naduda Naa papamul siluvalo mose nesu calvarin{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dehamantayun gaya mondene na rogamun bagu chesene Na sapamun bapenu mose nella badalan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu prabhukai emi chetunu deena manasuto sevajetunu Nan niratamu gachunu yellavela kollagan{/lang-eng}
